name: dts2as
description: A command line tool that converts TypeScript definitions (d.ts files) to ActionScript 3 classes and interfaces
author: Josh Tynjala

scripts.build: rm bin/*.js && tsc source/*.ts --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir bin
scripts.test: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir spec/bin spec/parser/*.ts && tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir spec/bin spec/as3/*.ts && jasmine
